translation: n.黄昏；薄暮；幽暗
examples: (1) The lights go on at dusk.(2) He usually goes out for a walk at dusk.(3) He works from dawn till dusk.(4) We made a landfall at dusk after three weeks at sea.(5) Dusk was brooding over the lake.(6) She was invisible in the dusk of the room.
(1) 一到黄昏灯就亮了。(2) 他通常在黄昏时出去散步。(3) 他从天亮工作到天黑。(4) 在海上航行三周后的一个黄昏,我们看到了陆地。(5) 薄暮正笼罩着湖水。(6) 她在昏暗的房间里别人看不到她。
Dusk is the period of time between sunset and nightfall. Many parents allow their children to roam freely in their neighborhood as long as they are home by dusk.

For some, dusk is seen as a mysterious, almost magical time, serving as the bridge between the brightness of day and the darkness of night. The English language contains numerous synonyms for dusk including crepuscule, evenfall, and gloaming. Owing perhaps to the mystical qualities associated with dusk, these words are better suited for poetry than for daily use.

1[N-UNCOUNT 不可数名词]黄昏；傍晚；薄暮 Dusk is the time just before night when the daylight has almost gone but when it is not completely dark. We arrived home at dusk.我们傍晚到家。2[N-UNCOUNT 不可数名词]暮色 The dusk is the dull, shadowy light there is at dusk.   [also the N]  [LITERARY 文]She turned and disappeared into the dusk.她转身消失在暮色中。

translation: n.灰尘；尘土；粉尘vt.去掉 ... 的灰尘；撒粉末于vi.除尘
examples: (1) The mirror is covered with a film of dust.(2) A thick layer of dust lay on the furniture.(3) She knocks the dust out of her coat.(4) The amount of the industrial dust is rather large.(5) I used a piece of rag to dust the wooden furniture.(6) Mum dusted the pan with flour.(7) It's dusty so we have to dust every day.
(1) 镜子蒙上了一层灰尘。(2) 家具上覆盖着一层厚厚的灰尘。(3) 她打掉外套上的尘土。(4) 工业粉尘排放量很大。(5) 我用一块抹布擦拭木制家具上的灰尘。(6) 妈妈在平地锅上撒了些面粉。(7) 灰尘多,所以我们必须每天掸灰除尘。
Dust is the fine, powdery substance that settles on surfaces over time or is blown around outdoors. A junk shop might be full of beautiful old furniture and books, all covered with dust.

There's the dust you clean with a feather duster, and then there's the verb "to dust." You can dust your bookshelves, cleaning the dust from them, but you can also dust the surface of a cake with powdered sugar, covering it lightly. Informally, when something "gathers dust," it goes unused, and when "the dust settles," a situation calms down.

1[N-UNCOUNT 不可数名词]尘土；沙尘 Dust is very small dry particles of earth or sand. Tanks raise huge trails of dust when they move...坦克开动时扬起大量尘土。He reversed into the stockade in a cloud of dust.他在一阵尘土中将车倒进了围栏。2[N-UNCOUNT 不可数名词]灰尘 Dust is the very small pieces of dirt which you find inside buildings, for example on furniture, floors, or lights. I could see a thick layer of dust on the stairs...我可以看见楼梯上有一层厚厚的灰尘。The rooms were empty of furniture and dust lay everywhere.房间里没有家具，到处都是灰尘。3[N-UNCOUNT 不可数名词]粉末；细末 Dust is a fine powder which consists of very small particles of a substance such as gold, wood, or coal.   [oft n N]The air is so black with diesel fumes and coal dust, I can barely see.空气中充斥着柴油烟雾和煤尘粉末，黑乎乎的，我几乎什么都看不见。4[VERB 动词]擦去…的灰尘 When you dust something such as furniture, you remove dust from it, usually using a cloth.   [V n]  [V]I vacuumed and dusted the living room...我用吸尘器打扫了客厅，擦了擦灰尘。She dusted, she cleaned, and she did the washing-up.她擦掉灰尘，打扫卫生，还清洗了餐具。dustingI'm very fortunate in that I don't have to do the washing-up or the dusting.我很幸运，因为我不用洗餐具也不用打扫灰尘。5[VERB 动词]涂(粉)；撒(粉)；在…上撒 If you dust something with a fine substance such as powder or if you dust a fine substance onto something, you cover it lightly with that substance.   [V n prep/adv]  [V adv/prep]Lightly dust the fish with flour...在鱼上撒上少许面粉。Dust and blend blusher on the apples of your cheeks...将胭脂调匀涂在你脸颊红润的地方。Dry your feet well and then dust between the toes with baby powder.把脚完全擦干，在脚趾间撒上婴儿爽身粉。6[PHRASE 短语]消亡；失败 If you say that something has bitten the dust, you are emphasizing that it no longer exists or that it has failed.   [V inflects]  [emphasis]  [HUMOROUS 幽默]  [INFORMAL 非正式]In the last 30 years many cherished values have bitten the dust...在过去的 30 年中，许多珍贵的价值观已经消失殆尽。The allegation has caused one lecturer's career to bite the dust.这项指控断送了一名讲师的前程。7[PHRASE 短语]尘埃落定；形势明朗；事态平息 If you say that something will happen when the dust settles, you mean that a situation will be clearer after it has calmed down. If you let the dust settle before doing something, you let a situation calm down before you try to do anything else.   [V inflects]  [INFORMAL 非正式]Once the dust had settled Beck defended his decision...事态一旦平息，贝克就为他的决定辩白。I think we need to let the dust settle and see what's going to happen after that.我认为我们需要等事态平息之后再看看会发生什么。8[PHRASE 短语]被搁置；被忽视；尘封 If you say that something is gathering dust, you mean that it has been left somewhere and nobody is using it or doing anything with it.   [V inflects]Many of the machines are gathering dust in basements...许多机器尘封在地下室里。The album is finally being released in October after gathering dust for over a year.尘封了一年多后，专辑终于在 10 月发行。相关词组：dust off

translation: adj.满是灰尘的
examples: (1) Sunlight filtered in through the dusty window.
(1) 阳光从满是灰尘的窗子透进去。
When you call something dusty, it's either literally covered in dust, or so old and unoriginal that it might as well be.

You can use a feather duster to clean off dusty surfaces, but if something is a dusty color, that just means it's got a grayish tint to it, like dusty pink or dusty blue. If something has been around for a really long time and it's worn-out, stale, or unoriginal, you can also call it dusty. If you're a stand up comedian whose been working the same act for thirty years, chances are your jokes are getting a little dusty.

1[ADJ-GRADED 能被表示程度的副词或介词词组修饰的形容词](通常指因为少雨而)布满灰尘的，满是尘土的 If places, roads, or other things outside are dusty, they are covered with tiny bits of earth or sand, usually because it has not rained for a long time.   [usu ADJ n]They started strolling down the dusty road in the moonlight.在月光下他们开始沿着满是尘土的路漫步。...a dusty old car.落满灰尘的老爷车2[ADJ-GRADED 能被表示程度的副词或介词词组修饰的形容词](房子、物件等)覆有灰尘的，尘封的 If a room, house, or object is dusty, it is covered with very small pieces of dirt. ...a dusty attic...满是灰尘的阁楼The books looked faded, dusty and unused.那些书看上去褪了色，尘封已久。

translation: adj.动力的；动态的；有活力的；【音】力度变化的n.动力；动力学
examples: (1) This chapter is on the transformation of heat energy into dynamic energy.(2) The different varieties of the language are in a dynamic relationship with each other.(3) We are looking for dynamic persons to be salesmen.(4) A dynamic government is necessary to meet the demands of a changing society.(5) Dynamics is a discipline that cannot be mastered without extensive practice.
(1) 这一章是关于热能转化成动力的。(2) 这种语言的不同变体间存在着动态的联系。(3) 我们正在寻找充满活力的销售人员。(4) 一个有活力的政府必须适应社会的改变。(5) 动力学是一门不做大量习题就不能掌握的学科。
If a person, place, or thing is energetic and active, then it's dynamic. When things are dynamic, there's a lot going on.

Even the most exciting rural town won't be as dynamic as a big city: there are just more things happening in a city. Someone with a dynamic personality is probably funny, loud, and excitable; a quiet, mousy person isn't dynamic. You can also talk about the dynamic aspect of music, which has to do with how the music uses dynamics, which means "changes in volume." When things are dynamic, changes and energy are in the air.

1[ADJ-GRADED 能被表示程度的副词或介词词组修饰的形容词](人)精力充沛的，有干劲的，富有创新思想的 If you describe someone as dynamic, you approve of them because they are full of energy or full of new and exciting ideas.   [approval]He seemed a dynamic and energetic leader...他似乎是一个富有干劲、精力充沛的领导。Marcus was handsome, dynamic and ambitious.马库斯仪表堂堂，精力充沛且雄心勃勃。dynamicallyHe's one of the most dynamically imaginative jazz pianists still functioning.他是当下仍旧活跃的最有闯劲、最具想象力的爵士乐钢琴师之一。2[ADJ-GRADED 能被表示程度的副词或介词词组修饰的形容词]活跃的；充满活力的 If you describe something as dynamic, you approve of it because it is very active and energetic.   [approval]South Asia continues to be the most dynamic economic region in the world.南亚仍然是世界上经济最活跃的地区。...90 minutes of dynamic Indian folk dance.90 分钟活力四射的印第安民间舞蹈3[ADJ 形容词]动态的；发展变化的 A dynamic process is one that constantly changes and progresses. ...a dynamic, evolving worldwide epidemic...不断发生变异、在世界范围内传播的流行病Political debate is dynamic.政治辩论是不断发展变化的。dynamicallyGermany has a dynamically growing market at home.德国国内市场持续增长。4[N-COUNT 可数名词](引起改变或进步的)动力，活力 The dynamic of a system or process is the force that causes it to change or progress.   [usu with supp]The dynamic of the market demands constant change and adjustment...市场要有活力，需要不断地改变和调整。Politics has its own dynamic.政治有其自身的驱动力。5[N-PLURAL 复数名词]相互作用；动态 The dynamics of a situation or group of people are the opposing forces within it that cause it to change.   [usu with supp]...the dynamics of the social system...社会体制的动态The interchange of ideas aids an understanding of family dynamics.思想的交流有助于理解家庭动态。6[N-UNCOUNT 不可数名词]驱动力 Dynamics are forces which produce power or movement.   [TECHNICAL 术语]Scientists observe the same dynamics in fluids.科学家们在液体中观察到了同样的驱动力。7[N-UNCOUNT 不可数名词]力学；动力学 Dynamics is the scientific study of motion, energy, and forces. His idea was to apply geometry to dynamics.他的想法就是将几何学应用在力学上。

translation: n.朝代；王朝
examples: (1) How many dynasties are there in China's history?(2) The Qing Dynasty ended in 1911.(3) The Tang Dynasty is a period remarkable for its liberality.(4) He was the son of a fallen dynasty.(5) The political tradition of Tudor dynasty determines its low rate of financial support.
(1) 中国历史上有多少个朝代？(2) 清朝结束于1911年。(3) 唐朝是一段以开明著称的时期。(4) 他是一个没落王朝的后代。(5) 都铎王朝的政治传统决定了其较低的财政供养率。
A dynasty is a series of leaders in the same family, like the British Royal Family, or a local business dynasty, in which four generations have made their fortune at the family store.

The word dynasty, pronounced "DIE-nas-tee," comes from the Greek word dynasteia, meaning "power, lordship, sovereignty." If you are part of a dynasty, you probably do have power — and also wealth, privilege. But there is also pressure to achieve as much as your parents, grandparents, and other relatives. Another kind of dynasty is found in sports — a team that wins many championships is a dynasty.

1[N-COUNT 可数名词]王朝 A dynasty is a series of rulers of a country who all belong to the same family. The Seljuk dynasty of Syria was founded in 1094.叙利亚的塞尔柱王朝始建于 1094 年。2[N-COUNT 可数名词]（某一）王朝的统治时期；朝；代 A dynasty is a period of time during which a country is ruled by members of the same family.   [with supp]...carvings dating back to the Ming dynasty.可以追溯到明朝的雕刻3[N-COUNT 可数名词]王朝(指同一家族在某领域，如政界或商界，有两代以上的重要领袖或权威人物) A dynasty is a family which has members from two or more generations who are important in a particular field of activity, for example in business or politics. ...the Kennedy dynasty.肯尼迪王朝

translation: n.圆盘；唱片；花盘；磁盘；盘形物
examples: (1) The moon's disk was reflected in the pond.(2) I have many disks.(3) I have no disk that may interest you.(4) Disk glands squarish, pubescent.(5) Disk undulate annular or irregularly lobed.(6) You can't copy your file with this disk; it's full.
(1) 似盘的月亮倒映在池塘里。(2) 我有许多唱片。(3) 我没有一张唱片能引起你的兴趣。(4) 花盘腺体近似方形的，短柔毛。(5) 花盘波状的环状的或不规则浅裂。(6) 你不能用这张磁盘拷文件，这张盘满了。
A disk is a round, flat circle. The face of the clock on your kitchen wall is a disk.

Disk, also spelled disc, refers to anything with a circular flat shape, like a Frisbee, a penny, or a dinner plate. In computing, a disk is a device that stores data, and in the audio/video world, a disk can be a musical compact disk, or a DVD, a digital video disk. A disk jockey is someone who plays music, either on LPs or CDs, on the radio. The Greek root, diskos, means "platter."

1[N-COUNT 可数名词]See also:disk drive；floppy disk；hard disk；磁盘；磁碟 In a computer, the disk is the part where information is stored.   [also on/to N]The program takes up 2.5 megabytes of disk space.这个程序占用 2.5 兆的磁盘空间。

translation: n. 死；死亡；死神；毁灭n. (Death)人名；(英)迪阿思
examples: The seedling was frozen to death.The farm came to him on his father's death.The film ends with the death of the heroine.Car accidents caused many deaths.He had to choose between death and dishonour.That defeat meant the death of all my hopes.There are conflicting versions of the girl's death.The policeman wanted to determine her death.
幼苗被冻死了。他父亲死时把农场留给他了。这部电影以女主角的死告终。车祸造成很多人死亡。他必须在死亡和屈辱之间作出选择。那次失败毁灭了我所有的希望。女孩死因的说法相互矛盾。那名警察想要查明她的死因。

translation: n. 十二月
examples: The weather in early December was bleak and unpleasant.My little daughter was born in December.December is the last month of the year.Postal applications must be received by 12 December.Here it is December and New Year is coming.
十二月初的天气又阴冷又难受。我的小女儿是十二月出生的。十二月是一年的最后一个月份。邮寄的申请书须于12月12日以前寄达。现在是十二月，新年就要来了。

translation: vt. 决定；解决；判决vi. 决定，下决心
examples: That decided me to leave my job.A chance meeting decided my career.He decided to get married.Don't decide on important matters too quickly.It's difficult to decide between the two.For each pair of sentences, decide where to use the active or passive form of the verb.
那件事使我决定离职。偶然的会面决定了我的事业。他决定结婚。不要过于匆忙地对重要的事情作决定。对这两者，不易做出抉择。在以下每组句子里,判断是该用单词的主动语态还是被动语态。

translation: n. 决定，决心；决议
examples: I don't think his decision is wise in reality.We can' t reach a decision without our chairman.All is dependent on your decision.The judge will give his decision tomorrow.
实际上,我觉得他的决定并不明智。主席不在场一切看你的决心而定。法官将于明天做出判决。

translation: vt. 装饰；布置；授勋给vi. 装饰；布置
examples: We decorated the house for Christmas.My mother likes to decorate rooms.I'll bring some balloons to decorate.May I help you decorate the room?It's necessary to decorate the classroom.The house was empty and easy to decorate.
我们装饰房屋过圣诞节。我妈妈非常喜欢装饰房间。我要带些气球去装饰装饰。我可以帮你装饰布置房间吗？有必要装修这间教室。房子是空的，装修起来很容易。

translation: n. 深处；深渊adj. 深的；低沉的；深奥的adv. 深入地；深深地；迟n. (Deep)人名；(英)迪普
examples: There is a deep divide between the two factions.The deer escaped to the deep forest.His personality left a deep impression on us.It's a deep and meaningful conversation.The grand building polarizes a deep local pride.We showed deep sympathy for her.The ship sank deep into the sea.They got lost in the deep of the forest.We passed the deep of the ocean without any casualties.
这两派之间有很深的分歧。那鹿逃入了丛林深处。他的人品给我们留下了深刻的印象。这是一次深奥而又意义深远的谈话。这座宏伟的建筑集中体现了当地人深切的自豪感。我们对她表示深切的同情。船深深地沉入了海底。他们在森林深处迷了路。我们毫发无伤地通过了大洋深处。

translation: n. 鹿n. (Deer)人名；(英)迪尔
examples: The deer darted away at the sight of a lion.There were deer in abundance in these forests.
鹿一见狮子就飞奔而逃。这些森林中有许多鹿。

translation: adj. 美味的；可口的
examples: She can produce delicious meal from very simple ingredients.The hunter entertained us with venison which was very delicious.The bannock is delicious.I like the delicious salad of crisp lettuce and tomatos.Isn't this a delicious concoction?
她能用简单配料烹调出美味的饭菜。猎人拿出了非常美味的鹿肉招待我们。这种薄饼很可口。我喜欢这种脆莴苣和番茄做的沙拉，很好吃。这不是一种很可口的混合酒吗?

translation: vt. 描述，形容；描绘
examples: The police asked me to describe exactly how it happened.Words cannot describe the beauty of the scene.He describes himself as a doctor.No one could describe the scorn of her expression.It is very difficult to describe my joy in words.The falling star described a long curve in the sky.
警察让我描述一下这事是怎样发生的。语言难以描述那景色之美丽。他自称是医生。谁也无法形容她那股鄙夷万分的表情。我的快乐难以用语言来形容。流星在空中画出了一道长长的弧线。

translation: n. 描述，描写；类型；说明书
examples: He gave a description of what he had seen.The scenery is beautiful beyond descriptions.He is very good at the description about the characters of different figures in his book.There are boats of every description on the lake.A description about a product should not mislead the customers.
他描述了他所见到的一切。那风景美丽得难以形容。他非常擅长在书中刻画不同人物的性格。湖上漂着各种类型的船。产品的说明书不能误导顾客。

translation: vt. 遗弃；放弃；逃跑vi. 遗弃；开小差；逃掉n. 沙漠；荒原；应得的赏罚adj. 沙漠的；荒凉的；不毛的
examples: Two thirds of the country is dry or desert.Some of them died of thirst in the desert.Water can transform a desert into a garden.The baby's mother deserted him soon after giving birth.The villages had been deserted.The price rise caused many readers to desert the magazine.A soldier who deserts in time of war is punished severely.
这个国家有三分之二的地方气候干燥,或者是沙漠。他们中有些人在沙漠中渴死了。水能把一片不毛之地变成一座花园。那个母亲生下他后不久就把他遗弃了。这些村庄已经荒无人烟了。价格上涨让使这本杂志丧失了很多读者。战争期间开小差的士兵要受到严惩。

translation: vi. 应受，应得vt. 应受，应得
examples: He has done nothing to deserve death.You deserve a reward for being so helpful.These proposals deserve careful study.
他没做过该受死刑的事。你帮了这么大的忙，理应受到奖励。这些建议值得认真研究。

translation: n. 办公桌；服务台；编辑部；（美）讲道台；乐谱架adj. 书桌的；桌上用的；伏案做的
examples: There are three books on the desk.The speaker had a sheaf of notes on the desk in front of him.He was rifling through her desk in a desperate search for the letter.This kind of desk can be adjusted to the height you need.You may leave your key at the reception desk.The couple went to check in at the front desk.Jefferies is running the sports desk.
书桌上有三本书。演讲者在他面前的桌子上放着一叠笔记。他拼命在她的书桌里搜寻那封信。这种书桌的高低可以按照你的需要调节。你可以把钥匙留在服务台。夫妻到前方柜台登记住入旅馆。杰弗里斯负责体育新闻组。

translation: adj. 侦探的n. 侦探
examples: The detective laid great stress on details.The detective was trying to ascertain exactly who was at the party.The detective thought the stick was relative to the murder case.The detective tried to reason out how the thief had escaped.The company hired a detective to investigate the accident.The detective posed as a mourner at the victim's funeral.She read detective stories as an escape.The detective film is very interesting.
侦探特别强调细节。这个侦探试图查明都有谁参加了聚会。侦探认为这根木棒和谋杀案有牵连。这个侦探反复琢磨想弄明白那个窃贼是怎样逃跑的。公司雇佣了一名侦探来调查这次事故。那侦探佯装成吊唁者参加了受害人的葬礼。她看侦探小说解闷。这部侦探电影非常有趣。

translation: vt. 开发；进步；使成长；使显影vi. 发育；生长；进化；显露
examples: Modern music was first developed in Italy.China can't develop in isolation from the rest of the world.Plants develop from seeds, but many animals developed from eggs.Investors agreed to pool their resources to develop the property.We can develop your film in an hour.How long will it take to develop these pictures?
现代音乐最初是在意大利发展起来的。中国的发展离不开世界。植物由种子发育而成,而许多动物由卵子发育而来。投资者们同意把大家的资源放在一起共同使用,来开发这块地产。我们可以于一小时后把你的胶卷冲洗出来。冲印这些照片要花多长时间?

translation: n. 图表；图解vt. 用图解法表示
examples: She gave me a diagram of railway network.The diagram had been copied with great precision.He pointed at the diagram to illustrate his point.He will diagram the entire procedure so that you can understand it more clearly.
她给了我一张铁路网图解。该图表的复印件很精确。他指着图表来说明他的论点。他将把整个程序制成图表，这样你就会理解清楚了。

translation: n. 对话；意见交换vi. 对话vt. 用对话表达
examples: The novel contains more narrative than dialogue.The writer is not very good at writing dialogues.At last there can be a reasonable dialogue between our two governments.They dialogue for three hours failed to come to an agreement.A peace promise must be made before the two countries formally dialogue.
这部小说里的叙述比对话多。这个作家不太擅长写对白。我们两国最后终于能理智地进行对话了。他们谈了三个小时，没有达成一致。这两个国家的正式对话必须建立在和平承诺的基础上。

translation: n. 日志，日记；日记簿
examples: His father ordered that he (should) keep a diary in English.I keep a diary every day.There is no further reference to him in her diary.The preface of this diary recounted her life.This diary is interleaved with blotting-paper.
他的父亲规定他要用英文写日记。我每天记日记。她的日记中没有进一步提到他。这本日记的前言叙述了她的生活。这个日记簿插有吸墨纸。

translation: n. 字典；词典
examples: That is not, properly speaking, a dictionary but a grammar book.He is, as it were, a walking dictionary.That dictionary belongs to me.A dictionary is an invaluable aid in learning a new language.Dictionary writers must be skilled in the art of definition.
严格地说，那不是一本字典，而是一本语法书。他可说是个活字典。那本字典是属于我的。在学习一种新语言时,辞典是非常有用的工具。词书编纂者必须精於给词语下定义的技巧。

translation: vi. 死亡；凋零；熄灭vt. 死，死于…n. 冲模，钢模；骰子n. (Die)人名；(西)迭；(阿拉伯)迪埃
examples: Nowadays many people die of cancer.Many people die from famine in Africa.My grandfather died at the age of 86.Flowers soon die if they are left without water.Coal mining is dying in this area.These rumors will soon die away.Many language are likely to die out.She's dying to know where you've been.
现在有很多人死于癌症。在非洲许多人死于饥荒。我爷爷在86岁时去世了。如果不给花儿浇水,很快它们就会枯死。这个地区的煤矿正日渐消失。这些谣言不久就会逐渐消失。许多语言可能会消失。她极想知道你到哪儿去了。

translation: n. 差异；不同；争执
examples: How do you account for the difference between them?Flowers make no difference to this room.It won't make much difference whether you go today or tomorrow.This convention makes no difference to the results.There is a slight difference between them.The government must borrow money to make up the difference.They were able to concert their difference.
你怎样来解释它们之间的差异呢？这房间有没有花没什么区别。你今天或明天去没有多大关系。这种习惯做法不会得出不同结果。他们之间有些许不同。政府必须借款来弥补该差额。他们能商议调解他们之间的分歧。

translation: adj. 不同的；个别的，与众不同的
examples: The two doctors made different diagnosis of my disease.He's a different man from what he was 10 years ago.You can't imagine how different it is from the John Grier Home.I called on three different occasions, but he was out.My husband has several shirts of different colors.
两位医生对我的病作出了不同的诊断。他和十年前不一样。你很难想象这里与约翰·格利尔孤儿院有多大的区别。我打了三次电话我丈夫有好几件颜色不同的衬衫。

translation: adj. 困难的；不随和的；执拗的
examples: The quest for gold was difficult.The child is going through a difficult phase.She handled a difficult argument skilfully.She is just being difficult.He was a difficult man to deal with.He is a difficult man to get along with.
寻找金矿是很困难的。那孩子正经历困难的阶段。她巧妙地应付了一场艰难的辩论。她正在闹别扭呢。他是个很难对付的人。他是个不易相处的人。

translation: vt. 挖，掘；探究vi. 挖掘n. 戳，刺；挖苦n. (Dig)人名；(罗)迪格
examples: Ten soldiers were told off to dig ditches.He was buried by an avalanche and had to be dug out.An old Greek statue was dug up here last month.The workmen broke up the pavement to dig up the pipes under it.Be sure to dig the whole garden over before winter.Let us now dig a little deeper into this theory.She gave me a sharp dig in the ribs.The dig also uncovered window glass and a knife made from bone.He made a big dig at his boastful brother.She never fails to have a dig at me if she has the chance.
十名战士被分派去挖沟。他遇雪崩被埋住了，得把他挖出来。上个月在这儿挖出了一尊古希腊雕像。工人们把柏油路刨开，把埋在下面的管子掘了出来。在冬季来临前要把园子好好地翻一下。现在我们再深入的探究一下这个理论。轻轻的一戳就会使她禁不住要笑。这次挖掘也发现了玻璃窗和骨制的刀。他狠狠挖苦他那个喜欢自吹自擂的兄弟。她一有机会就挖苦我。

translation: adj. 数字的；手指的n. 数字；键
examples: Most of the computers we are using are digital computers.This is my newly bought digital watch.I just looked at the digital map.Digital cameras can eat up a lot of power.Today's laser digital disks have many advantages.Based on rough counting of mechanic fetch pills, the system realized twice electronic minutia counting based on technique of digital image processing.
我们正在使用的计算机大多数是数字计算机。这是我新买的数字手表。我刚查看完数字地图。数码相机是很费电的。现在人们使用的激光数码唱片的优点太多了。该系统在机械取丸粗计数的基础上，采用数字图像处理技术完成了两次细计数，保证了数丸的高精度。

translation: 餐厅
examples: Their dining room is very spacious.
他们的餐厅很宽敞。

translation: n. 晚餐，晚宴；宴会；正餐n. (Dinner)人名；(法)迪内
examples: It's time for dinner.It is now his turn to set me up to a nice dinner.We invite her to have Thanksgiving dinner with us.Because my husband has gone to a stag dinner, I have to stay at home alone.Tell the guests not to dress for dinner.Almost an hour has passed since the dinner started.This is a celebrity fundraising dinner.They're at dinner.
该吃晚饭了。现在轮到他请我吃一顿丰盛的晚餐了。我们邀请她和我们一起吃感恩节晚餐。因为我丈夫去参加一个只许男人参加的宴会，我只好独自待在家里。告诉客人们晚宴不要穿得太正式。晚宴已进行了将近一个小时。这是一次社会名流筹措资金的晚宴。他们正在用餐。

translation: n. 恐龙；过时、落伍的人或事物
examples: The blue whale is bigger than the biggest dinosaur.We reconstructed what the dinosaur looked like from a few of its bones.His movie of the extinction of dinosaurs was a great success.
蓝鲸比最大的恐龙还要大。我们根据恐龙的一些骨头重组恐龙的原貌。他的关于恐龙灭绝的电影取得了巨大的成功。

translation: adj. 下流的，卑鄙的；肮脏的；恶劣的；暗淡的vt. 弄脏vi. 变脏
examples: The clothes on the floor are dirty.The tourist complained that the room was too dirty.The dirty pub is a beastly place.They sat drinking and telling dirty stories.They have been playing all sorts of dirty tricks.The progress of that country is hindered by dirty politics.This campaign was dirty and contentious.You'll dirty your hand if you play in the dirt.He will dirty his reputation by following bad people and doing bad things.
地板上的那些衣物是脏的.游客抱怨说房间太脏了。那个肮脏的小酒馆是一个叫人恶心的地方。他们坐在那里，边喝酒边讲下流故事。他们一直在耍弄种种卑鄙的伎俩。那个国家因腐败的政治而停滞不前。这次的竞选活动充满阴谋并让人争论不已。如果你去玩泥巴，手会弄脏。和坏人一起做坏事,这将玷污他自己的名声。

translation: vi. 消失；失踪；不复存在vt. 使…不存在；使…消失
examples: The sun disappeared behind a cloud.Many beautiful fish are fast disappearing because of the severe pollution.My wallet has disappeared from the table.I saw her step  the street and disappear into the post-office.
太阳消失在一片云后面。因为污染严重，许多美丽的鱼类正在面临绝种。我放在桌子上的钱包不见了。我看见她在街上步行，进了邮局就不见了。

translation: adj. 失望的，沮丧的；受挫折的
examples: I'm afraid you're very disappointed with me.A disappointed look came into his face.
恐怕你对我是非常失望的。他脸上浮现出一种失望的神情。

translation: vt. 发现；发觉vi. 发现
examples: He was later discovered to have been a spy.The fact is that he did not discover it.I discovered him kissing my wife.We discovered that our luggage had been stolen.
后来发现他原来是间谍。事实是他没有发现它。我撞见他在吻我的妻子。我们发觉行李被偷了.

translation: vt. 讨论；论述，辩论
examples: We will discuss the proposal at the meeting.They said they had an important matter to discuss with you.The causes of stress have already been discussed in Chapter 3.We discussed when we should go.They discussed how to solve the problem.
我们将在会议上讨论这项提议。他们说有要事与你相商。压力产生的原因在第三章就已经论述过了。我们商量什么时候动身。他们商量如何解决该问题。

translation: n. 讨论，议论
examples: In their discussion, I was in favor of Mr. Li.I was not privy to the discussion, so I cannot tell you what was decided.The whole discussion pivots on this one point.Their case is now under discussion.He joined us in the discussion yesterday.When will the matter come up for discussion?Politics is a good topic for discussion.A frank discussion can help to clear the air.The others were diverted to a discussion of the more agreeable recent murders.
在他们的争论中，我支持李先生。我并不了解讨论的情况，所以无法告诉你做了什么决定。整个讨论内容均以此为中心。他们的案件现在正在讨论中。他昨天参加了我们的讨论。这件事什么时候提出来讨论？政治是谈论的好题目。坦率的谈论有助于消除疑虑。别人都换了话题，谈论更有趣的最近的几起谋杀案。

translation: n. 病，[医] 疾病；弊病vt. 传染；使…有病
examples: The disease is still in its primary stage.The entire population was wiped out by the terrible disease.The rapid spread of the disease is alarming the medical authorities.The treatment arrested the growth of the disease.He postulated that a cure for the disease will have been found by the year 2000.
这疾病仍然在初发阶段。所有的居民都被可怕的疾病夺去了生命。这种疾病的迅速蔓延使医疗当局感到忧虑不安。治疗抑制了病情的发展。他推断到2000年能研究出治愈该病的方法。

translation: n. 盘；餐具；一盘食物；外貌有吸引力的人vt. 盛于碟盘中；分发；使某人的希望破灭；说（某人）的闲话vi. 成碟状；闲谈
examples: The careless waiter dropped the dish onto the ground.That dish is too shallow to serve soup in.This glass dish is very fragile.He knows the recipe for this dish.You could use tomato sauce for this dish.The meat should be finely diced for this dish.She asked Mary to help her dish up the dinner.That salesman could really dish it out.
那个粗心的侍者把盘子摔到了地上。那只盘子太浅了，不能盛汤。这玻璃碟子十分易碎。他知道这道菜的烹饪方法。你可以用蕃茄沙司来配这道菜肴。做这种菜肴肉必须细细切成小方块。她要玛丽帮她把菜肴分盛到盘子里。那个推销员确实能说会道。

translation: n. 圆盘，[电子] 唱片（等于disk）vt. 灌唱片
examples: I have many discs.The compact disc is a miracle of modern technology.I bought this new Beatles disc on sale today.The edge of the disc had been machined smooth.The disc went spinning away into the sky.The disc looked like an Stone Age record.In ancient times the earth was conceived as a flat disc.He wears an identity disc round his neck.This glass disc looks very fragile.Have you recorded the data in disc?You can't copy your file with this disc; it's full.A disc is divided into several clusters.
我有许多唱片。激光唱片是当代技术的奇葩。今天减价时我买了这张披头士的新唱片。圆盘的边缘已用机器磨光。圆盘旋转着飞入空中。圆盘看起来像一张石器时代唱片。在古代人们认为地球呈扁平的圆盘状。他脖子上挂著身分牌儿。这个玻璃盘子看起来很容易碎。你已把那些数据存储到磁盘上了吗？你不能用这张磁盘拷文件，这张盘满了。磁盘是由许多簇构成的。

translation: vt. 打扰；妨碍；使不安；弄乱；使恼怒vi. 打扰；妨碍
examples: They took the phone off the hook so no calls would disturb them.I am sorry to disturb you.Ministers declared themselves profoundly disturbed by the violence.A soft breeze gently disturbed the surface of the pool.None of the citizens should disturb the public peace.
他们摘下电话听筒，以免电话打扰他们。很抱歉我妨碍到你了。大臣们自称因为暴力而感到深刻的不安。一阵微风吹拂了平静的池塘。城市居民不可以扰乱公共治安。

translation: vi. 潜水；跳水；俯冲；急剧下降n. 潜水；跳水；俯冲；扑n. (Dive)人名；(法)迪夫
examples: Our dive is a part of this expedition.What a beautiful dive!He dived from the bridge and rescued the drowning child.The eagle dived down on the rabbit.Children always dive to the bottom of a subject.
我们这次潜水活动就是属于这个远航的一部分。多么优美的跳水！他从桥上跳入水中，救起溺水的孩子。那只鹰向兔子猛扑下来。孩子们对问题总是追根究底的。

translation: n. 要求；规定；C大调音阶中的第一音v. 做；干；学习；研究；进行；完成；解答；整理；算出；引起；行过aux. 助动词（构成疑问句和否定句）；（代替动词）；（用于加强语气）vi. 行，足够；生长n. （英）多（人名Dorothea和Dorothy的昵称）n. （口语）事件；（主英国口语）诈骗；（主英国、新西兰口语）宴会；（口语）必须做到的事情
examples: He is doing his homework.Do what I tell you.To tell you the truth, I hate to do it.He did little work that day.Take your time and do it well.The horse is too old to do farm work.
他正在做他的家庭作业。按照我告诉你的去做。老实告诉你,我不愿意做这事。那天他没有干什么工作。你要抓紧时间,干得干脆利索。这匹马太老了,不能干农活了。

translation: 请勿；不可以
examples: I do not share his radical views.Nothing in the world would induce me to do that.
我不同意他的激进观点。什么也不能引诱我做那种事。

translation: vt. 修理；篡改，伪造；为…治病；授以博士学位n. 医生；博士vi. 就医；行医
examples: He is a Doctor of Philosophy.His illness was more serious than the doctor first thought.How else can the doctor save him?
他是一位哲学博士。他的病较医生原来以为的更严重。医院还有别的方法可以救他吗？

translation: n. 文件，公文；[计] 文档；证件vt. 记录，记载
examples: She signed her name to the document.He persuaded her to sign the document by guile.The official document was misworded.A document issued to sub-branches shall be sealed by all the issuers.Change Document Display Master Rec.Changes document direction to right-to-left.The history of this area is very well documented.He can document his theory with facts.That's a very interesting claim, but can you document it?
她在文件上签了名。他用欺骗手段说服她在文件上签字。这公文的措词不当。联合下发的公文，发文机关都应当加盖印章。更改文档显示主记录。将文档方向改为从右向左。这个地区的历史档案保存得很好。他能为自己的理论提供事实证明。那项要求很有意思，可是你有证件加以证明吗？

translation: v. 做；工作；有用（do的第三人称单数形式）n. (Does)人名；(荷)杜斯
examples: His work does not reach the standard required.How long does it take to fly from here to Japan?I can't bear him; he does everything at a snail's pace.Does desertion ground for divorce?He's very systematic in all he does.Does your job fulfill your expectations?How much does it cost to go abroad?Little does he care whether we live or die.
他的工作成绩达不到要求。从这里飞到日本要多久？我真受不了他，他做什么事都磨磨蹭蹭。被配偶遗弃是离婚的理由吗？他做一切事情都很有条理。你的工作符合你的期望吗？出国要多少钱？他一点也不管我们是死是活。

translation: 不
examples: Death does not discriminate; it comes to everyone.Your behavior does not accord with your principle.Land belonging to the crown does not belong to the king personally but to the state.He does not know what to do with his vacant time.This letter does not pertain to politics.Seasoned timber does not warp.That shop does not stock stationery.He does not think so.
死亡对每个人都一视同仁，它会降临到每个人的身上。你的行为与你的原则不符。皇室的领地并非属于国王私人所有，而是属于国家的。他不知道空闲时间该干点什么。这封信的内容与政治无关。经干燥处理的木材不会翘曲。那家商店不卖文具。他不这样想。

translation: n. 狗；卑鄙的人；(俚)朋友vt. 跟踪；尾随
examples: The dog kept a vigilant guard over the house.He is really a lucky dog.You stole my watch, you dog.Her career was dogged by misfortunes.If you keep dogging me, I will definitely call the police.
这只狗警惕地守护着这所房屋。他真是个幸运的家伙。你偷了我的手表，你这个卑鄙小人她一生屡遭不幸.如果你一直跟踪我,我肯定要报警了。

translation: n. 洋娃娃；玩偶；无头脑的美丽女人vt. 把…打扮得花枝招展n. (Doll)人名；(英)多尔(女子教名Dorothea和Dorothy的昵称)；(西)多利
examples: My daughter has many beautiful dolls.She wanted very much a doll for Christmas.My grand-daughter is a little doll.Hence with the alternating operation of the inflator the doll is raised or lowered to achieve an attractive effect.She was all dolled up in furs and jewels.I am going to get dolled up for the party.
我女儿有许多漂亮的洋娃娃。她非常想要一个玩具娃娃作为圣诞节的礼物。我的孙女是个小可人儿。因此，与交替运作的充气，娃娃是提高或降低要达到一个具吸引力的效果。她以皮大衣和珠宝把自己打扮得漂漂亮亮。我马上好好打扮一下去参加聚会。

translation: n. 美元n. (Dollar)人名；(英)多拉尔
examples: The Japanese yen rebounded against the dollar.Can you lend me five dollars?The pound stayed firm against dollar in London but fell a little in New York.
日元与美元的比价回升了。你能借给我五美元吗？在伦敦英镑对美元仍坚挺，但在纽约却跌了一点儿。

translation: vt. 捐赠；捐献vi. 捐赠；捐献
examples: I can donate one hundred dollars at best.We donate to the school endowment fund every year.The government calls on the youth to donate their blood voluntarily.
我充其量只能捐助100美元。我们每年向学校的捐赠基金捐款。政府号召青年义务献血。

translation: n. 门；家，户；门口；通道n. (Door)人名；(英)多尔
examples: He chiseled a hole in the door to fit a new lock.Somebody opened the door and the candle blew out.He sprang up and rushed to the door.He made for the door and tried to escape.They refused to negotiate, thus closing the door on any chance of a settlement.
他在门上凿了个孔，以便装一把新锁。有人打开了门，蜡烛随之被吹灭了。他跳起身，跑到门口。他向门口走去，企图逃跑。他们拒绝谈判，因此堵死了解决闸题的途径。

translation: n. 两倍；双精度型adj. 双重的；两倍的vi. 加倍，加倍努力；快步走vt. 使加倍adv. 双重地；两倍地；弓身地n. (Double)人名；(法)杜布勒；(英)道布尔
examples: The date had a double significance.This machine serves a double purpose.The egg has a double yolk.He was so fat that he had a double chin.You can't park on a double yellow line.I'll give you double pay for working overtime.The output is double that of last year.Shard joy is a double joy and shard sorrow is half a sorrow.I think we can double our profits in one month.The modern equipment enables them to double their production.If you should be off guard,you would double the loss.If you double five， you make ten.The measures will enable us to double our output of bicycles.If you buy a new bicycle, it will cost more than double.I ordered the coffee in double before you come.
那个日子有双重意义。这部机器有双重用途。这只蛋双黄。他胖得有双下巴了。有双黄线处不准停车。你加班我付你双倍工钱。产量比去年增加一倍。分享快乐会变成双倍的快乐,分享悲伤会减半。我认为我们可以在一个月内把利润翻一番。现代化的设备使他们能把产量翻倍。如果你粗心大意，你一定会加倍损失。五加倍就是十。这些措施能使我们的自行车产量加倍。如果你买新的自行车，价格要贵一倍多。你来之前我点了双份咖啡。

translation: n. 双层甲板船；双层公共汽车；双层床；双层夹心三明治
examples: They want to rent a double decker.Can you jump over double Decker buses?Double Decker buses depart every 30 minutes from seven centrally-located stops.Nominations included Stonehenge, the double decker bus, fish and chips, the English weather and the cup of tea.Nominations included Stonehenge, the double decker bus, fish and chips, the English weat yr and the cup of tea.They created the bus by taking a British double decker bus, adding a level and painting it purple.
他们想租一辆双层电车。 您能否跳过双层汽车？ 每隔半小时，双层巴士就从中心地带的7个站点分别发一趟车。 提名名单中包含了巨石遗址、双层巴士、炸鱼片配薯条、英国天气和茶。 提名名单中包含了巨石遗址、双层巴士、炸鱼片配薯条、英国天气和茶。 骑士公共汽车是用英国一辆双层公共汽车改造的，剧组在车顶又加了一层，然后漆成紫色。

translation: adv. 向下，下去；在下面adj. 向下的n. 软毛，绒毛；[地质] 开阔的高地prep. 沿着，往下vt. 打倒，击败vi. 下降；下去n. (Down)人名；(英)唐
examples: Please sit down.He is walking down the seaside.I've been feeling down since I lost my job.She's terribly down on people who don't do things her way.A quilt stuffed with the down of the eider duck.Antiaircraft guns downed three bombers.He downed his opponent with a quick right to the jaw.The Dodgers downed the Mets in last night's game.Some people can down a pound of meat in the course of one meal.I don't think her regret will down.
请坐下。他正沿海边走去。自从失去工作後,我的情绪一直处於低潮。她对不按她的要求做事的人十分不满。这条被子是用绒鸭毛做芯子的。高射炮击落了三架轰炸机。他迅速准确击中对手的下颌而把他击倒。在昨晚比赛中道杰斯队击败了梅兹队。有些人一顿饭就可以吞吃许多肉。我认为她的悔恨不会消除。

translation: vt. [计] 下载
examples: Wait until it's finished downloading.You can download this software for free.The download failed.Your mail packet is ready for download.
等到下载完毕。你可以免费下载该软件。下载失败了。你的信件包可以开始下载了。

translation: adv. 在楼下adj. 楼下的n. 楼下
examples: Your downstairs neighbor let me in.The young man downstairs is a lawyer.The children made a loud noise downstairs.He sat sipping grog alone downstairs.I'll remodel the downstairs bedroom first.Ask the lady downstairs to come up.
楼下的邻居让我进来的。楼下的那位年轻人是律师。孩子们在楼下大声喧哗。他坐在楼下慢慢地把水酒独酌。我先要装修楼下那间房间。请楼下那位太太上楼来。

translation: abbr. 速度三角形定位法（dead reckoning）；数据记录器（Data Recorder）
examples: Dr Hardy was a founder member of the club.Dr Smith attended her in hospital.
哈迪博士是俱乐部的创始会员之一。史密斯医生在医院中给她治病。

translation: vt. 画；拉；吸引vi. 拉；拖n. 平局；抽签n. (Draw)人名；(英)德劳
examples: The horses draw the wagon.Our car broke down and we had to draw it to a garage.The season was drawing to its dusty end.Mary drew a house on the paper.I'll draw some money from my account.Will you draw the curtain across the window?His work is to draw up plans for an extension.They had been dueling for hours and finally called a draw.French official argued with the organizers over the draw.Draw your chair up to the table.A live band is always a good draw at a party.
马拖货车。我们的车坏了, 不得不把它拖到修车厂去。喧嚣纷扰的社交季节逐渐接近尾声。玛丽在纸上画了一栋房子。我要提取一些存款。把窗帘拉上好吗?他的工作就是绘制扩建图。他们一直决斗了数小时，最后打成平局。法国队官员就抽签的事同比赛组织者发生了争执。把你的椅子拉到桌子旁边来。现场演奏的乐队在聚会上总是很吸引人的。

translation: vi. 梦想；做梦，梦见；想到n. 梦想，愿望；梦vt. 梦想；做梦；想到adj. 梦的；理想的；不切实际的
examples: I had some very strange dreams last night.I have a recurrent dream that I've turned into an elephant.My son's dream is to be an astronaut.His dream of becoming an artist has been fulfilled.She claims she never dreams.I often dream about being wealthy.He dreams of one day becoming a famous violinist.The youths always dream fondly of their future.
昨晚我做了很奇怪的梦。我屡次梦见自己变成了大象。我儿子的理想是当宇航员。他成为一个艺术家的梦想实现了。她说她从来不做梦。我经常梦到发财。他梦想有朝一日成为著名的小提琴家。年轻人对前途总是怀有美好的梦想。

translation: vt. 给…穿衣vi. 穿衣n. 连衣裙；女装n. (Dress)人名；(法、德、西)德雷斯
examples: She wears a beautiful evening dress.She wore a diamond clip on her new dress.They tried to dress him up as a"national hero".She always dresses in black.She is parading the hall in her new dress.Li Mei is wearing a yellow dress today.I dress my sister and wash her hands and face.
她穿着一件漂亮的晚礼服。她在新衣服上戴了一枚钻石别针。他们想把他打扮成一个“民族英雄”。她总穿着黑衣服。她穿着新衣服招摇地在大厅里走。李梅今天穿着一件黄色的连衣裙。我给我妹妹穿衣服，洗脸洗手。

translation: n. 干燥机；干燥剂；吹风机dry的比较级
examples: He bought an electric hair-drier for Mary.She untangled her hair from the hair drier.She put her clothes in the drier, so she could wear them this afternoon.
他给玛丽买了一个电吹风。她把搅在吹风机上的头发松开了。她把衣服放在干衣机里，这样她下午就能穿这些衣服了。

translation: vt. 喝，饮；吸收；举杯庆贺vi. 喝酒；饮水；干杯n. 酒，饮料；喝酒
examples: It is harmful to your health to drink too much.It's not good to drink on an empty stomach.Let us drink to the health of our father.The deer lowered its head to drink from the pond.Cold tea makes an excellent drink in summer.The management will provide food and drink.My father's health was undermined by drink.He has squandered all his savings on drink.He will have a drink in the bar after work.
过量喝酒对你的身体有害。空腹喝酒不好。让我们举杯为父亲祝福。鹿低下头去喝池塘里的水。在夏天，凉茶是一种很好的饮料。管理部门将供应饮食。我爸爸的健康逐渐为酒所损害。他把存的钱全买酒喝了。下班之后他总去酒吧喝一杯。

translation: vi. 开车；猛击；飞跑vt. 推动，发动（机器等）；驾驶（马车，汽车等）；驱赶n. 驱动器；驾车；[心理] 内驱力，推进力；快车道
examples: He is too little to drive a car.Don't drink and drive.They got a cat to drive out the mice.A man driven by jealousy is capable of anything.Loneliness almost drived her mad.We went for a drive in the afternoon.He mislaid his principles in the drive for success.He is clever but he won't succeed because he lacks drive.The carriage rolled along the drive.There is no disk in the selected drive.
他太小了,不能开车。别喝了酒开车。他们找到一只猫来驱赶老鼠。嫉妒心可使人什么都做得出来。孤独几乎使她发疯了。我们下午开车出去兜风。他为了成功而拋弃了原则。他聪明是聪明，但是没有干劲，做事不会成功。马车沿车路滚动而行。所选驱动器上没有磁盘。

translation: n. 驾驶员；驱动程序；起子；传动器n. (Driver)人名；(德)德里弗；(英)德赖弗
examples: The driver slacked up on the gas pedal.A good driver keeps his eye on the road.I'm a hopeless driver, but the examiner let me through.The driver was not to blame for the accident.The driver was weaving his way through the traffic.The driver is controlled by the program of MCU.
驾驶员松开油门减速。好的驾驶员会注意看路。我开车的技术糟透了，但考官让我及格了。这次事故怪不着司机。司机在车辆和人流中曲折前进。该驱动器由单片机进行程序化控制。

translation: vt. 滴；使降低；使终止；随口漏出vi. 下降；终止n. 滴；落下；空投；微量；滴剂
examples: She dropped to safety from the burning building.He dropped off from his bike.In the winter the temperature often drops below freezing.I decided to drop chemistry and take biology instead.You have dropped an "f" in your spelling of the word "different".Will you drop your old friends if you accomplish both success and fame?Unconsciously, a drop of tear drips on his lips.I'll have a wee drop of cream in my coffee.As the course becomes more difficult, there's usually a corresponding drop of the number of students.Life is but a dewdrop on the lotus leaf.
她从失火的建筑物上坠落到安全的地方.他从自行车上跌下来。冬天的时候,温度往往会降到冰点以下。我决定放弃化学,改学生物。你拼写“different”这个词的时候漏掉了一个“f”。如果你功成名就,你会同你的老朋友们断绝来往吗?不知不觉,一滴泪水滴在他唇上。我要在咖啡里放一丁点儿奶油。随着课程逐渐变难,上课的学生人数也相应减少了。生命只是荷叶上的一滴露珠。

translation: adj. 干的；口渴的；枯燥无味的；禁酒的vt. 把…弄干vi. 变干n. 干涸n. (Dry)人名；(法)德里
examples: The soil is too dry for planting.After these dry days, everyone hopes for rain.We should prepare for more dry weather.I always feel dry in this hot weather.The book is as dry as dust.The bread will dry out if it is left on the table.I dry my hands and face with the towel.
土太干了，不能种东西。干燥的天气之后，人人都希望下雨。我们应该为更干旱的天气做准备。遇到这种炎热天气我总感到口渴。这本书枯燥无味。不要把面包放在桌上，它会变干的。我用毛巾擦干了双手和面部。

translation: n. 鸭子；鸭肉；（英）宝贝儿；零分vi. 闪避；没入水中vt. 躲避；猛按…入水n. (Duck)人名；(德、葡、匈)杜克
examples: The special today is pressed duck with walnuts.They visited a duck farm operated by the corporation.You cannot teach an old duck new tricks.There are many ducks swimming in the lake.She's a sweet old duck.
今天的特色菜是桃仁酥鸭。他们参观了这个公司办的养鸭场。老鸭学不会新把戏。湖里有许多鸭子在游泳。她是个可爱的老太婆。

translation: n. 小鸭子
examples: The ducklings plumped into the water.We're going to feed the duckling.
小鸭们突然跳进水中。我们去喂小鸭子。

translation: n. 饺子，汤团；面团布丁
examples: I feel like having some dumplings.To make stuffed dumpling is his speciality.Usually, they put a coin in a dumpling.We usually eat a kind of rice dumpling called yuanxiao.I suggest you take a dumpling soup and a portion of spring rolls.
我很想吃饺子。包饺子是他的拿手好戏。通常，人们会在一个饺子里放一个硬币。我们通常吃一种叫做汤圆的团子。我建议你来一份馄饨和一份春卷吧。

translation: prep. 在…的时候，在…的期间n. (During)人名；(法)迪兰；(瑞典、利比)杜林
examples: He swims every day during the summer.The thief broke into the house during the night.He was born in China during World War II and educated in England.
他夏天每天游泳。小偷在夜间破门进入住宅。他在二次大战期间生于中国,后来在英国受。

translation: n. 垃圾箱；吃货
examples: Please put the garbage in the dustbin.She tipped the rubbish into a dustbin.
请把垃圾放在桶里。她把垃圾倒进垃圾箱。

translation: n. 责任；[税收] 关税；职务n. (Duty)人名；(英)迪蒂
examples: I feel it my duty to speak frankly to you.She was ashamed to admit that she hadn't done her duty.He is on night duty three days a week.He was dismissed for his neglect of duty.I think it my duty to serve the people.His heroic action came from a strong sense of duty.You pay the duty at the desk and get the receipt.The government imposes a special duty on oil.The duty on imported vodka has been raised.
我觉得我有义务要坦白地对你说。她羞愧地承认她没有尽到自己的义务。他一个星期要上三天夜班。他因玩忽职守而被开除了。我认为为人民服务是我的责任。他的英勇行为来源于强烈的责任感。你可以在出纳台交税，然后拿到收据。政府征特殊石油税。进口伏特加的关税已经提高了。

translation: abbr. 数字化视频光盘（Digital Video Disk）
examples: Visible Record, as an organization promoting documentary films, is to build a DVD distribution network of the latest and finest Chinese documentary films.
采风电影搜集了各地最新最出色的华语纪录片，制作成影碟发行。

translation: adj. 动态的；动力的；动力学的；有活力的n. 动态；动力
examples: This chapter is on the transformation of heat energy into dynamic energy.The different varieties of the language are in a dynamic relationship with each other.We are looking for dynamic persons to be salesmen.A dynamic government is necessary to meet the demands of a changing society.They hoped it would act as a spiritual dynamic on all churches.Dynamics is a discipline that cannot be mastered without extensive practice.
这一章是关于热能转化成动力的。这种语言的不同变体间存在着动态的联系。我们正在寻找充满活力的销售人员。一个有活力的政府必须适应社会的改变。他们希望这对所有教堂来说都是一种精神动力。动力学是一门不做大量习题就不能掌握的学科。

translation: n. 王朝，朝代
examples: How many dynasties are there in China's history?The Qing Dynasty ended in 1911.The Tang Dynasty is a period remarkable for its liberality.He was the son of a fallen dynasty.The political tradition of Tudor dynasty determines its low rate of financial support.
中国历史上有多少个朝代？清朝结束于1911年。唐朝是一段以开明著称的时期。他是一个没落王朝的后代。都铎王朝的政治传统决定了其较低的财政供养率。

translation: 日以继夜
examples: Our parents are worrying about us day and night.The days and nights were a blur of medical reports.
父母亲日日夜夜地为我们操心受累。日日夜夜都是治疗报告。

translation: 处理；涉及；做生意
examples: We have no space to deal with such details.I have a huge pile of letters to deal with.Firstly, let us deal with the most important issue.
我们没有篇幅来讨论这种细微末节。我有一大堆信件要处理。首先让我们来处理最紧要的问题。

translation: 取决于；依赖；依靠
examples: Children depend on their parents for food and clothing.All living things depend on the sun for their growth.A lot will depend on how she responds to the challenge.It all depends on whether she like the boss or not.But that all depend on the specific circumstances.
小孩依赖他们的父母供给衣食。万物生长靠太阳。在很大程度上将取决於她对这一难题的反应。一切都取决于她喜欢还是不喜欢这个老板。不过，那要看具体情况而定。

translation: 灭绝；消失
examples: The lump had almost flattened out.And so long as men die, liberty will never perish.The wolf died out in Britain hundreds of years ago.Some animals have been wiped out through ignorance.
这肿块差不多消失了。只要我们不畏牺牲，自由就永远也不会消失！狼在英国数百年前就灭绝了。有些动物由于人们的无知而灭绝了。

translation: 与…不同，不同于
examples: Their school is different from ours.Reading and writing are different skills.
他们的学校与我们的不同。阅读与写作是不同的技能。

translation: 瓜分；分割；分配
examples: They divvied up the winnings between them.They-vied up the profits among themselves.We split up our profit yesterday.We need a method to divide the pie fairly.
他们瓜分了赢得的钱。他们一伙瓜分赢利。昨天我们分配了我们得到的利润。我们需要一种公平地分配馅饼的方法。

translation: 几十；许多
examples: The young astress has starred in dozens of films.The juggler conjured a rabbit out of the hat.
这个青年女演员主演了几十部电影。那个耍把戏的人从几十变出一只兔子来。

translation: (使)落进；(使)往里坍塌：偶然(或顺便)走访(或访问)(on)；逐渐进入：[口语](有选择地)加入；愿意(或决心)参加：【戏剧】放下(吊幕)，吊装布景：
examples: I dropped in on the Browns on my way home.I dropped in to ask if you would care to play a round of golf this evening.
我在回家的路上顺便走访了布朗夫妇。我来顺便走访，问你今晚是否想打一场高尔夫球。

translation: adv. 由于；应归于
examples: The two countries were on the point of war due to the diplomatic disputes.Great changes are in prospect in this area due to foreign investment.His successes were largely due to luck.
这两个国家因为外交争端即将开战。因为外资的引进，该地区会发生很大变化。他的成功主要靠运气。
